reference: If Alkar is flooding her with psychic waste, that explains the high level of neurotransmitters.
translation: if Alkar floods her with her mental waste, it would explain the high levels of neurotransmitter.

reference: Well, we could spare your life, for one.
translation: well, we can spare your life.

reference: Ah! Monkey, you've got to snap out of it.
translation: monkey, you have to wake up.

reference: I've got orders to put her down.
translation: I have orders to kill her.

reference: I'm not gonna have a child... ...with the same genetic disorder as me who's gonna die. L...
translation: I'm not going to breed kids with a genetic disorder that makes them die.

reference: They're all laughing at us, so we'll kick your ass.
translation: they're laughing at us. We'll show you.

reference: Maine was very short on black people back then.

reference: Another one simply had no clue what to do, so whenever he met my brother he'd beat the crap out of him, and then say:
